# Service Ownership Checklist

Use this checklist to keep ownership and stewardship clear.

## Ownership

- [ ] Primary owner listed in README
- [ ] Backup owner listed in README
- [ ] On-call escalation path documented

## Service Health

- [ ] SLOs reviewed monthly
- [ ] Error budget reviewed monthly
- [ ] Cost anomalies reviewed monthly
- [ ] Dependencies and SLAs reviewed quarterly

## Knowledge Transfer

- [ ] Runbook reviewed quarterly
- [ ] Top 3 risks reviewed quarterly
- [ ] Open incidents and follow-ups tracked
